name: Astro Pong
description:
Astro Pong is a mashup of the classic Pong and Asteroids Games.

In this 2-Player Local Versus Game you face off to score points by placing the ball into your oponents goal while avoiding asteroids.

PATCH NOTES: 
6/30/2018 :: Added Glowing effect to primary features to make it really Pop.

NOTES:
I'm not sure if controllers work on this. I designed it to be played with WASD and Arrows.
Fun Fact: Game was made using 3D objects but you only see them in 2D.
